title: Angels All Around
description: The prequel to the popular Threshold Series by Christa Kinde, Angels All Around is an illustrated short story set in a small town where not everyone is what they seem.Amidst the chaos and confusion, will a new divine Messenger become one little girlâ€™s prince, and a fledgling Guardian become their knight, or will evil take its hold?Includes a bonus first chapter from Book #1 in the Threshold series, The Blue Door!
author: Christa Kinde
